[Cipher.ConnectionTypes]
discord = Cipher.conns.discord.connection:DiscordConnection
discord_base = Cipher.conns.discord.connection:DiscordBaseConnection
irc = Cipher.conns.irc.connection:IRCConnection
tg = Cipher.conns.tg.connection:TGConnection

[Cipher.Plugins]
CipherBridge = Cipher.plugins.bridge:BridgePlugin
CipherCore = Cipher.plugins.core:CorePlugin

[console_scripts]
Cipher = Cipher.core.cli:main
